amendment.description: To increase FY 2009 funding for the Byrne/Justice Assistance Grant program to $906,000,000 with an offset.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4230 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4230 proposed by Senator Conrad for Senator Chambliss. (consideration: CR 3/14/2008 S2078-2080; text: CR 3/14/2008 S2078) To increase FY 2009 funding for the Byrne/Justice Assistance Grant program to $906,000,000 with an offset.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4230 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4230 proposed by Senator Conrad for Senator Chambliss.
